survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate attendee satisfaction and gather feedback on hybrid (in-person and virtual) event experiences to improve future event planning.

questions.question_text: Which type of attendance did you choose for the event?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for single selection. This helps segment respondents for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Which type of attendance did you choose for the event?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the event overall?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the event overall?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the virtual event platform?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include N/A option for in-person attendees. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the virtual event platform?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual' in Q1

questions.question_text: How would you rate the venue facilities for in-person attendees?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'In-person only' or 'Both in-person and virtual' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include N/A option for virtual-only attendees. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: How would you rate the venue facilities for in-person attendees?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'In-person only' or 'Both in-person and virtual' in Q1

questions.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during the virtual event?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question with N/A option. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during the virtual event?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Virtual only' or 'Both in-person and virtual' in Q1

questions.question_text: If you experienced technical difficulties, please describe them:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather specific feedback. Ensure text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: If you experienced technical difficulties, please describe them:

questions.question_text: How effective were the networking opportunities at the event?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Did not participate' option. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: How effective were the networking opportunities at the event?

questions.question_text: What topics would you like to see covered in future events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions. Use a large text box.

script.question_text: What topics would you like to see covered in future events?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend future events organized by us?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving future hybrid events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture final feedback. Use a large text box.
